short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enabling your personal finances to be a click away

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Okane enables your personal finances to be a click away! We help manage your spending by making your financials accessible as you browse. Our Okane logo will appear during your browsing experience to inform you about your immediate financial situation.

Okane works initially without having to add your account. We offer a demo version, in case, you wanted to try us out first. 

In order to fully utilize Okane, make sure you add your financial accounts!

See our demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=duW8JiaUQjw

_________________________________________________
We have more features coming soon (ex: goal setting, automatic identification of large purchases to 'burn down', etc.). So stayed tuned and let us know you want more!
_________________________________________________

Please leave feedback on our Extension by writing a review! For further information regarding privacy policies or for general information/questions please head to https://okane.crd.co/ or email us at okane-team@okane-app.com!

Okane is fully compliant with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). To learn more, please visit https://okane.crd.co/#privacy . As mentioned in our privacy policy, this product is not meant for the use of those below 18.
